name: Glitched Drifting
description:
Version 0.01

More Updates In The Future :)

Hopefully Going To Finish And Publish.

A drifting car game based in a virtual city full of jumps, roads, and sharp turns! You are able to drift which make the game what it is and opens many opportunities for fun, sick tricks and much more. This game is in its alpha stage right now but the future is bright for this game!
